version_description: Performance optimisations.
Performance improvements.

Brand new and shiny visual look for all buttons and pop-ups.
Now packs of gold bars can be bought with real money.
Also check out the starter pack offer, just for you my friend!
bug fixes and performance improvements.

*** major update ***
Enjoy unlimited taps in the latest version!
Yes! The Tap-o-meter has been removed.
We want to thank our players for sending feedback and suggestions.
Tip: Remember to keep the cafe manager upgraded.

Plenty of other new things for you to enjoy as well
- New epic baristas have arrived in Berlin. Hip and cool is an understatement.
- Baristas now have a favourite coffee with powerful boost multiplier
- Pixel steaming hot new icon
visual improvements and bug fixes.
Fixed a bug with coffee station Mega Upgrades.

*** Big Update ***
A mystery box will now arrive to your cafe every 12 hours.
Open the box and discover collectible cards that give additional bonuses to various coffees, tips and golden beans.
Gotta get them all!

Also featuring
- Mega upgrade the manager to give a mega boost to cart wheel capacity $$$€€€
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
* Added 2 new collectible cards to boost the manager in NY & Berlin

Fresh version delivers
* New Limited time offers for cash, gold and collectible packs!
* Shortcut button to activate manager boost & 4h sale boost
* Bug fixes and performance improvements
Enjoy while it’s hot!

Added support for playing the game in 13 different languages.
+ more quests and achievements
+ minor updates and bug fixes.
Enjoy while it's hot!

* New Cafe! Expand your empire to new depths - the people of Atlantis wait to be served underwater coffee!
* New visual look in freshly re-decorated Berlin cafe
* Turbo boost your manager with caffeine to collect cash faster

Added support for playing the game in 13 more languages.
+ new fancier achievements tab and world map
+ new quest bar
+ minor updates and bug fixes.
Enjoy while it's hot!

Added support for playing the game in 13 different languages.
+ more quests and achievements
+ minor updates and bug fixes.
Enjoy while it's hot!

Fresh version delivers
* New Limited time offers for cash, gold and collectible packs!
* Shortcut button to activate manager boost & 4h sale boost
* Bug fixes and performance improvements
Enjoy while it’s hot!
bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fix to the issue with not receiving the reward from video ads.

***Refill your coffee cups***
- Lots of bugs fixed (e.g. missing video ad rewards)
- Balancing: Added new mega upgrade level to manager!
- A ton of new missions for Berlin and Atlantis + new shiny icons for achievements.
- Free gold can be doubled every 4 hours
- Use gold to get x3 Earnings when returning to your café

Welcome coffee lovers! The Golden Weeks are here with special offers that deliver even more goodies and bonuses! And now your new cafes come with some extra flavor in the shape of a ribbon cutting ceremony!
Welcome coffee lovers! The latest version lets you become a VIP cafe owner to receive great benefits that will help you out with expanding your coffee empire!

A flying coffee cup now appears in your cafe to help you out with expanding the business! The card system has been revamped to provide more opportunities to grow your empire. You can also bend time to receive resources from the future!
Welcome coffee lovers! The latest updates introduces: 4th, out of this world cafe that will bring the gift of coffee to the final frontier!
Game optimization
Minor bug fixes and improvements

***Fresh batch of coffee is ready***
- New shiny look for the Barista cards with 3D character models
- Quick navigation for switching between coffee stations
- Improved manager stat screen
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
Game optimization
